About me

I create things and I blog about it... sometimes.

Hi, my name is Marcos Barbero, I’m originally from Brazil and currently I’m living in The Netherlands. I’m a software engineer working mostly with Java since 2005-ish.

Articles published on this blog are my personal opinion and mine alone. They do in no way reflect the opinions and/or strategies of my employer and/or clients. Should you feel personally offended by an articles or wish to point out incorrect facts, feel free to contact me through a PM on LinkedIn. I’d be happy to discuss it.
